manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us GIGABYTE offers a comprehensive product lineup that aims to “Upgrade Your Life.” With expertise encompassing consumer, business, gaming, and cloud systems, GIGABYTE established its reputation as a leader in the industry with award-winning products including motherboards, graphics cards, laptops, mini PCs, monitors, and other PC components and accessories.As a perennial developer in PC and server hardware and solutions, GIGABYTE is dedicated to foster marvelous user experiences for content creators and gamers, allowing their imagination to manifest a better life; as a server hardware and solution provider, GIGABYTE is poised to extend our scope in business servers and cloud systems with hardware and software solutions that integrate AI and AloT applications to allow customers to capture, analyze, and transform digital information into economic data, accelerating businesses' success from edge to cloud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The first MB sent to me was bad . Asked for a replacement and was promptly sent a replacement and it works great. Any product can be bad , but the company backing up there product makes you come back, Why to go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use just make sure you update the Bios if you are using a new CPU!
reviews.reviewText: The Gigabyte B450M DS3H WiFi is a budget-friendly micro-ATX motherboard that offers a mix of features suitable for mid-range gaming and general computing tasks. Here's a review of the motherboard with a final rating of 7.2/10:Build Quality (7/10): The build quality is decent for the price, with a standard micro-ATX form factor. It may not have the premium feel of higher-end motherboards, but it does not lack what matters.Connectivity (6/10): One of its key selling points is the inclusion of built-in Wi-Fi, which is a valuable addition for users who prefer a wireless connection. However i found that the Wi-fi was avg at best and would say connecting via a ethernet would still trump it.Price (8/10): One of the main strengths of the B450M DS3H WiFi is its affordability. It offers good value for the price, making it an attractive option for budget-conscious users who still want a decent feature set.Over all like i said at the top 7.2 out of 10 get it if you need a budget board!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Packed with features at a great price
reviews.reviewText: For my high-end gaming PC, I go with ASUS, but for every other PC in my house, I've come to rely on Gigabyte motherboards because I've honestly never had a problem with them, and they simply last forever. This thing has everything you might need for less than 100 bucks. Wifi? Check. Bluetooth? Yep. M2 slot. 4x SATA ports, just in case you need that much from a budget board.It was instantly compatible with my new Ryzen 5600GT, which I bought on release day. I was kind of concerned about possible BIOS compatibility, but Gigabyte had me covered.For a budget gaming rig or home server, the value is hard to beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good solid motherboard -supports everything but the newest processors
reviews.reviewText: Good motherboard, easy to install, no issues. Gets more millage out of older hardware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars wifi no driver, even though i try to down load it.
reviews.reviewText: wifi does not work, who else know where i can download the wifi dirver?i had try many times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Consistent BSOD's on Windows 11...
reviews.reviewText: After a week or so of fine usage I ended up getting BSOD's randomly throughout the week with no real reason. Hypervisor error, Kernel Security?, Driver Less than Equal... those 3 specifically. None of them really correlate with a specific part. I assumed it might be the RAM and bought a set on the QVL list to try and rule it out but I BSODed 30 min ago. The CPU could be faulty but I feel like that's something that either works or doesn't and that part has had no issues working. This board also has a lack of fan headers too so beware if you want to take that chance. I'm out of the refund window so i'm SOL, I'm gonna get an ASUS board and not get bottom bin boards from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It gets the job done!
reviews.reviewText: I built this to play AAA titles at 4K and 1080P. Nothing fancy just dependable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: pros:good price installed with rizen5 with onboard gpu and 32 gig ram and it turned and worked okfits my full tower casei get 60 fps with the onboard vid playing warcraft and ff14 [no lag in raids] with win10Cons:only gpu card that block the hd ports are the long ones

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Motherboard For The Price! Until it broke 3 days later!!!
reviews.reviewText: I had am MSI B450M mobo and it died after two years of use... No I DID'T buy it from Amazon! LOLI bought this mobo wanting to keep with the B450 model.I dropped my 5600 in the socket, Wired everything up, And it worked like new!NO BIOS UPDATE NEEDED FOR 5000 series processors.VERY HAPPY customer!Amazon to the rescue once again!!!EDIT PLEASE NOTE!!!The motherboard lasted for about 3 days before it died.All of the sudden the display went blank, And NOTHING!I tried different cords and the like, But to no avail.Fortunately I had purchased another MOBO by mistake when I bought this one, So I lucked out there.I was gonna return it today, I'm thankful I didn't!Now I have to return this one...UPDATE!!! So that EXTRA MOBO I bought went dead... Unimpressed.I decided to buy ANOTHER one of these B450M MOBO.So far so good. Will update if anything bad happens.

reviews.reviewTitle: Many occasions of no signal to monitor
reviews.reviewText: The motherboard was paired with Ryzen 5 5600G. I updated the bios from version F61 to F64. There were many occasions where there was no signal received by the monitor in the process of booting up. Bios posting was okay but black screen when it started to load windows 11. When rebooted, it always stopped at"Windows was not properly shut down" and repeating the same problem if restarting the pc. I tried with both integrated graphic and discrete graphic card, new hdmi cable and different monitors, all don't help. It somehow managed to boot up properly after many trial and errors. Initially, I suspected it could be a power problem or defective motherboard but when I googled trying to find a solution, I then realised that there many reporting similar problem. Could it be a bios problem rather than issue of defective hardwares.
Easy to build reasonable function and WiFi for a good price would buy again at that price

reviews.reviewTitle: Gets the job done and is a better price then other competitors, at the cost of size
reviews.reviewText: I have this device and it fits nicely, maybe slightly smaller than I expected, but that was my fault. Still has many plug-ins, and is an amazing little gadget.
